properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-48N 049-11W AND 04-46N 050-05W.
   B. 29 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-48N 049-18W AND 04-51N 050-07W.
   C. 30 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-49N 049-03W AND 04-42N 050-02W.
   D. 01 MAY ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-46N 048-51W AND 04-33N 049-54W.
   E. 02 MAY ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-49N 048-51W AND 04-33N 049-54W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 03 MAY.
